Question: This person guided his black Cadillac Fleetwood toward Argonne, arriving sometime past midnight.
Hints: In response to his father's death, his son, this person Jr., said, "millions have lost a friend".
This person and his radio network stated that the stories in that series, although entertaining, were completely true.
The series quickly grew to six broadcasts a week, and continued until this person's death in 2009.
